response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value to me. Given its importance and the unique benefits it offers, I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $12,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure that the product finds a home with someone who will appreciate and utilize it to its full potential. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
